Package org.fiware.cybercaptor.server.remediation

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DeployableRemediation
    Class representing a deployable remediation = a list of DeployableRemediationAction (remediations that can be deployed on a host) with a cost.
    DeployableRemediationAction
    Class representing a deployable remediation action: a RemediationAction that can be deployed on a specific host.
    Patch
    Class representing a patch
    Remediation
    Abstract class that represent remediations
    RemediationAction
    Class that represents a remediation action to correct a vulnerability For example : applying a patch, training a user, deploying a firewall or snort rule,...
    Rule
    Class to manage a Snort rule
    RuleReference
    Class to manage the references options contained in a snort rule
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    RemediationAction.ActionType
    The possible types of remediation
